metadata.name: The Angels 3
metadata.description:
In the Angels’ collection, contemporary human and angels are the same and some times they fall down and some times they go up in a repetitive model, during the course of human’s evolution.
The elements that are used in this collection are single paper pieces that after their fabrication, according to the concept of the illustration, come together in photography frame, then they are taken in photos and after they turn as a motional pictures.
The music used in this video is a part of my own composing projects.
